categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases
Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic space stations

nodes.text: During the events of the Mission to Panna Prime, one of the Rebel Alliance's bases was located in an asteroid field.

Tasked with recovering a mystical Talisman for the Rebellion, Han Solo and Chewbacca nearly crashed into the base on their return trip due to the effects of the sleeping virus the Galactic Empire had contaminated the talisman with. Luke Skywalker and the two droids C-3PO and R2-D2 set out from the base in a BTL-S3 Y-wing starfighter to track them down after the near-crash.

General Ristt was the ranking officer of the base. Other known personnel included Princess Leia Organa, several Rebel communications operators and Captain Kazan. Kazan commanded the Alliance cruiser RS Revenge that was stationed at the base.
